.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSubresourceLayout-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSubresourceLayout-image-parameter]] pname:image must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSubresourceLayout-pSubresource-parameter]] pname:pSubresource must: be a valid pointer to a valid sname:VkImageSubresource structure
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSubresourceLayout-pLayout-parameter]] pname:pLayout must: be a valid pointer to a sname:VkSubresourceLayout structure
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSubresourceLayout-image-parent]] pname:image must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from pname:device
****
